segments.text: Look , Jim . That man just fell down over there .

segments.text: We'd better see if he is ok .

segments.text: Sir , sir , are you all right , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He is not answering . You'd better check his pulse and breathing .

segments.text: Hello ? Yes , someone has passed out at Dongle Ave . and 2nd street . He isn't breathing and doesn't have a pulse . Yes , my friend is performing CPR . Ok , thank you . They are sending an ambulance . Here , let me help .
